title: Clients — Fix PDF logo scaling and add AC branded export
description: Fix the Nativz logo being squished in PDF exports. Maintain proper aspect ratio. Implement an Anderson Collaborative branded PDF export option that auto-selects based on client agency.
acceptanceCriteria: Nativz logo maintains proper aspect ratio in PDF
AC branded PDF export option available
Branding auto-selects based on client's agency
Layout consistent in both Nativz and AC versions

steps.details: In the PDF export components (components/onboard/strategy-pdf.tsx and components/results/search-pdf-document.tsx), find the Image component rendering the logo. Set explicit width and height that maintain the logo's aspect ratio. Use objectFit='contain' equivalent for @react-pdf/renderer.
Search the project for an AC/Anderson Collaborative logo file. Verify it exists and is suitable for PDF rendering (PNG preferred). Note the path.

steps.description: Create AC logo export in brand-logo.ts
steps.details: Add a proper AC_LOGO_PNG export in lib/brand-logo.ts with the actual AC logo (currently it's aliased to NATIVZ_LOGO_PNG as a placeholder).
In the PDF export components, accept a client agency prop. Use NATIVZ_LOGO_PNG for Nativz clients and AC_LOGO_PNG for AC clients. Adjust any brand colors if needed.
Generate PDF for a Nativz client and an AC client. Verify logos display correctly with proper aspect ratios in both.

technicalNotes: AC_LOGO_PNG currently aliases to NATIVZ_LOGO_PNG in lib/brand-logo.ts — needs real AC logo
@react-pdf/renderer Image component uses style={{ width, height }} for sizing
Logo is base64 encoded PNG in brand-logo.ts
